variable.name: hud_teamfrags_fliptext
variable.description: Toggles alignment of team names in 'teamfrags' HUD element.

boolean.true: Rows aligned to the right side, team tags are on the left side of frag counts.
boolean.false: Rows aligned to the left side, team tags are on the right side of frag counts.

variable.remarks: Use 'teamfrags shownames 1' to show names of teams.
